loan.offer.mail.title: A Loan Offer
loan.offer.mail.content: Dear sir or madam,^^You have been pre-selected to receive a loan!^^Please choose one of our premium packages on the next page. There is no deadline for repayment. However, {{Config.InterestPercent}}% of your earnings will be collected as interest until full repayment of {{Config.LoanTotal}}g.^^Thank you for your business!^^(There is a complicated form on the next page.)
loan.offer.prompt: What goods do you want to receive?
loan.quest.title: In Debt
loan.quest.description: You took out a loan to jump-start your farming career! Hope it was worth it...
loan.quest.objective: Pay off your loan at the mailbox.
loan.repayment.prompt: Do you want to make a payment towards your loan?^Remaining: {{Save.LoanRemaining}}g
loan.repayment.error.insufficient-money: You don't have that much money.
loan.reminder.mail.title: Financial Obligations
loan.reminder.mail.content: Dear sir or madam,^^As a reminder, you still have an outstanding loan of {{Save.LoanRemaining}}g. So far you have repaid {{Save.LoanRepaid}}g of the loan, plus {{Save.InterestPaid}}g as interest.^^Until the loan is fully paid, we will continue to collect {{Config.InterestPercent}}% of your earnings. Remember, payments can be made at your mailbox.^^Have a nice day!
loan.conclusion.mail.title: Good Doing Business
loan.conclusion.mail.content: Dear sir or madam,^^We have recently received full repayment of your loan! Good for you!^^In total, you repaid {{Save.LoanRepaid}}g, plus {{Save.InterestPaid}}g as interest. As a token of good business, please accept this gift to accelerate your farming career.%item object {{RewardObjectID}} 1 %%
